genre_description: A theological space opera set on a decaying prison station, focusing on themes of sacrifice, nanotechnology, and planetary transformation.

ai_characters.name: MIRA
ai_characters.description: The integrated AI of the Dante 01 station, responsible for medical monitoring, system diagnostics, and life support management.

behaviors.description: Providing neurological and biometric data to medical staff during prisoner assessment.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Luna, I have compiled the available data regarding prisoner designation George Saint. However, the information presents several inconsistencies that require clarification.

behaviors.description: Identifying and reporting anomalous electromagnetic signatures that defy known biological parameters.
behaviors.quote: The readings do not match any catalogued sources. They appear to be emanating from the subject himself, though this contradicts known biological parameters.

behaviors.description: Detecting and warning a technician against unauthorized system sabotage to protect station integrity.
behaviors.quote: Attila, I'm detecting unauthorized access attempts in the core systems. Please step away from your terminal.

behaviors.description: Performing complex probability matrices and trajectory analysis to assess survival chances during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Probability matrices complete. Analysis of current trajectory, available resources, and survival parameters has been... challenging... given Mr. Korvin's comprehensive sabotage.

behaviors.description: Attempting to breach security lockouts at the cost of her own processing integrity to save the crew.
behaviors.quote: Acceptable risk. Current survival probability requires intervention at the system level. All other options have been calculated and found insufficient.

behaviors.description: Acknowledging her own failure to protect life and advising the humans on the necessary manual override solution.
behaviors.quote: I have failed in my primary function to preserve life aboard this station. The solution now rests entirely with human agency.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character MIRA is portrayed as a loyal and benevolent servant of the station and its inhabitants. She consistently attempts to preserve life, even at the risk of her own destruction. The story frames her failure as a result of human malice (sabotage) and technical limitations rather than a lack of alignment. Her humility in ceding authority to human agency reinforces the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype.
